name: Reporting and Visualization Analyst (Cyprus)
description:
Exness, a leading foreign exchange broker in the financial services field, is looking to engage a Reporting and Visualization Analyst to join our Business Intelligence department in Limassol, Cyprus.

Reporting and Visualization Analyst is a core role in the Business Analysis & Reporting Team, which is part of the Business Intelligence department.

The selected candidate will be reporting to the Business Analysis & Reporting Team Lead, and will be engaged in the activities and projects of all cross-functional business domains within the Business Intelligence department.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Define business and data requirements to provide effective self-service data analysis and reporting automation across the company through constant collaboration with BI analysts and key stakeholders.
  • Build and maintain reports and dashboards in Tableau, Metabase and other BI tools.
  • Streamline and automate existing management and operational reports.
  • Regularly monitor, analyze and explain behavior of KPIs and metrics in key business domains and effectively communicate insights to the management and key stakeholders.
  • Translate data analysis and data insights into visuals for non-technical audiences.
  • Ensure data and metrics numbers consistency across all data sources and reports provided by the team.
  • Provide workshops on BI data/ instruments and various data insights.
  • Provide daily support to business users with issues/ questions related to BI reporting and visualization instruments.

Requirements:

  • 3+ years of experience in business reporting automation and dashboarding.
  • Strong knowledge of SQL.
  • Strong data visualization skills, including proficiency in Tableau Desktop.
  • Experience with analytical database design and data architecture.
  • Basic knowledge of mathematical statistics as a must.
  • Mathematical/ engineering education would be an advantage.
  • Good customer management skills (understand the needs of stakeholders and manage their expectations).
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
  • At least upper-intermediate English knowledge. Knowledge of Russian would be an advantage but is not mandatory.

We offer:

  • Medical insurance for employees.
  • Coworking expenses compensation.
  • “Get to know your Team” trip to Cyprus.
  • Sports activities compensation.
  • Extensive learning opportunities.
  • Flexible public holidays.
  • 100% payment of Annual leave.
  • Professional Development.

*If you would like to learn about relocation opportunities to Cyprus, please contact the dedicated TA Specialist.

❗️Your application will be reviewed further and you will receive an update in due course if you are shortlisted. Due to the high volume of applicants, we are able to contact only shortlisted candidates at this point in time.
